text:
Mr. Mukul Maheshwari’s distinguished journey has spanned critical advancements in sustainable energy and lubricants research. His leadership has driven remarkable results in IndianOil’s advanced sustainable endeavours including Hydrogen production and Biodiesel. We extend our best wishes for his continued success in journey ahead.
#IndianOil #ForeverAnIOCian

text:
Immensely proud of our amazing gal trio, IOCian @manikabatra_TT , @SreejaAkula31 and IOCian Archana Kamath on smashing their way to the #TableTennis Quarter-Finals at #Paris2024! 

What a fabulous win for #TeamIndia in Women's Team Round of 16 against Romania by 3 - 2!

Go gals, India is rooting for you! 

#IndiaAtParis2024 
#Cheer4Bharat 
#IndianOilSportstar
#IndiaShines 
#TheRoadToGlory 
#FuelingTheChampionships

profile_bio.description: The official handle of IndianOil.  IndianOil is ranked 116th among the world's largest corporate in Fortune ‘Global 500' listing for the year 2024.

quoted_tweet.text:
Women's Team Round of 16  👇🏻

#TableTennis🏓

The Indian🇮🇳 team consisting of Manika Batra, Sreeja Akula, and Archana Kamath defeats Romania 3-2 to advance to the Quarter-Finals.

Take a look at the results:

Sreeja/Archana defeated Adina Diaconu/Elizabeta Samara 11-9, 12-10, 11-7.

@manikabatra_TT defeated Bernadette Szocs 11-5, 11-7, 11-7.

@SreejaAkula31 lost to Elizabeta Samara 11-8, 4-11, 11-7, 6-11, 8-11.

Archana lost to Bernadette Szocs 5-11, 11-8, 7-11, 9-11.

Manika Batra defeated Adina Diaconu 11-5, 11-9, 11-9.

Indian team will face the winner of the match between United States and Germany on August 6 at 6.30 pm IST.

Super proud of you girls!🤩👏🏻

Let #Cheer4Bharat chants continue and support #TeamIndia☑️🥳

text:
So proud of our IOCian the SENsational Lakshya for creating history and storming into the Semi-Finals @Paris2024!

1st #Indian male shuttler to smash this breakthrough with an awe-inspiring performance in the Quarter Finals 💪

In a display of sheer brilliance, he conquered Chou Tien Chen, with an impressive score of 19-21, 21-15, 21-12.

@lakshya_sen , We are rooting for your incredible ascent! 

India's heart swells with immense joy & pride! 🇮🇳

#IndiaAtParis2024
#Cheer4Bharat
#IndiaShines #TheRoadToGlory #FuelingTheChampionships #IndianOilSportstar #BadmintonHero

text:

#IndianOilSpotstar Chirag-Satwik won their final group-stage match in the Men's #Badminton Doubles at #Paris2024 with a convincing 2-0 win, sailing to #quarter-finals! 

Heartiest congratulations to the dynamic duo on this remarkable feat!

Root for them as they strive for glory!

#IndiaAtParis2024
#Cheer4Bharat
